name: lineup
description: To prepare his students for an upcoming game, the sports coach decides to try some new training drills. To begin with, he lines them up and starts with the following warm-up exercise: when the coach says `'L'`, he instructs the students to turn to the left. Alternatively, when he says `'R'`, they should turn to the right. Finally, when the coach says `'A'`, the students should turn around.
